casebody.data:
MARGARET DALEY, as Administratrix of the Estate of Barnwell Roy Daley, deceased, v. SALLY K. MAYO, unmarried. 26 So. (2nd) 820

June Term, 1946

July 19, 1946 Division A Samuel Kassewitz, and P. Guy Crews, for appellant. Evan T. Evans and Edwin C. Coffee, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

This appeal is from an order granting a new trial in a personal injury action. The record reveals no abuse of discretion, so the judgment is affirmed.

Affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
